name: Can you achieve F.I.R.E.?
description:
Retirement isn't an age. It's a financial number. You don't have to work the 9-5 grind until you are 65.

Can you imagine not working unless you want to?  Can you imagine the freedom to do what you love? Can you imagine being able to travel whenever you want and spend more time with loved ones?

Can you achieve F.I.R.E. (Financial Independence, Retire Early)?
